Connector

Class DataAccessObject

  • java.lang.Object
    • Connector.DataAccessObject

  • public class DataAccessObject
extends Object
    This class is used to pull data from the Database, and update/insert values into the database.
    Author:
    emilv

      Constructor and Description
      DataAccessObject()

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Customer checkCustomer(String email, String password)
      Searches the customer table for a row with the corresponding email and password.
      Bottom getBottom(String bottomName)
      Searches the bottom table for the row with the corresponding bot_name, and returns it as a Bottom object.
      ArrayList<Bottom> getBottoms()
      Takes everything from the bottom table, and inserts it into an ArrayList of Bottom objects.

      Searches the customer table for a row with the corresponding email, and returns it as an object.

      Searches the database for a LineItem (Product in the Database) with an integer, representing the prod_id.

      Searches the topping table of the database, for a row with the corresponding name, and returns it as an object.

      Returns everything from the topping table, as Topping objects in an ArrayList.

      Updates the database, by inserting a new row into the customer table.

        public Customer getCustomer(String email)
                     throws SQLException

      • checkCustomer

        public Customer checkCustomer(String email,
                              String password)
                       throws SQLException
        Searches the customer table for a row with the corresponding email and password. If the Customer is found, a Customer object will be returned, otherwise a null object will be found.
        Parameters:
        email - - The users email
        password - - The users password
        Returns:
        Customer
        Throws:
        SQLException

      • getLineItem

        public LineItem getLineItem(int prodID)
                     throws SQLException
        Searches the database for a LineItem (Product in the Database) with an integer, representing the prod_id. If a LineItem with the corresponding prod_id is found, a LineItem will be returned. Otherwise a null object will be returned.
        Parameters:
        prodID - - Product id
        Returns:
        LineItem
        Throws:
        SQLException

        Parameters:
        bottomName - - Self explanatory
        Returns:
        Bottom
        Throws:
        SQLException

      • newOrder

        public boolean newOrder(int order_id,
                        int order_total_price,
                        int customer_id)
                 throws SQLException
        Add an order to database. PreparedStatements are used to protect from SQL injections. Method will return true if succesfully added to database. Otherwise it will return false if add was either by already used email or that the database is down
        Parameters:
        order_total_price - - Total Price of the order
        customer_id - - Self explanatory
        Returns:
        boolean
        Throws:
        SQLException

        ArrayList - ArrayList of Order
        Throws:
        SQLException

        Returns:
